verses.roman:
haridāsera kailā teṅha caraṇa vandana
jāni' haridāsa tāṅre kailā āliṅgana

synonyms: haridāsera—of Haridāsa Ṭhākura; kailā—did; teṅha—he; caraṇa vandana—worshiping the lotus feet; jāni'-knowing; haridāsa—Haridāsa Ṭhākura; tāṅre—him; kailā āliṅgana—embraced.
translation: He offered his respects to the lotus feet of Haridāsa Ṭhākura, who knew him and thus embraced him.
